info.title: API2Cart
info.description: API2Cart is a unified shopping cart data interface that makes integration with multiple shopping cart APIs simple and effective. Service supports integration with 30+ eCommerce platforms, including Magento, PrestaShop, OpenCart, VirtueMart, Shopify, BigCommerce, WooCommerce,  and can be used to cooperate with numerous business software in various fields including: Mobile Commerce, Social Commerce, E-mail Marketing, Inventory Management, Order Management, Comparison Shopping Engines, Analytics System, Accounting System and other.

get.description: Download bridge for store
Get bridge key and store key
Add store to account

parameters.name: cart_id
parameters.description: Cart ID. The value is case sensitive. Choose the cart with the method cart.list

parameters.name: db_tables_prefix
parameters.description: Database tables prefix for downloadable carts.

parameters.name: ftp_store_dir
parameters.description: Store directory location on server. For example: /public_html/store

parameters.name: store_key
parameters.description: API2Cart Store Key. Set this parameter if bridge is already uploaded to store.

parameters.name: verify
parameters.description: Cart validation. Skip validation to add shopping cart if verify=false

get.description: Remove store. Store deletion will be performed without confirmation. To add Demo store press Add Demo Store button
Disconnect with the store and clear store session data.
Get list of supported carts
Get list of cart methods
Check store availability, check bridge connection for the downloadable carts, identify database prefix, validate API accesses for API carts.
Count categories in store.
Search category in store. "Laptop" is specified here be default.

parameters.name: find_where
parameters.description: Search category by parameter, for example: name,model.

get.description: Get category info about category ID*** or specify other category ID.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: List of comma separated fields which need to be retrieved - example: name,model,id,parent_id or force_all (list all details)

get.description: Get list of categories from store. Test method performance with 4 categories.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of categories in the list returned by request. Maximum value - 10. Default value - 10.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: List of comma separated fields which need to be retrieved - example: name,model,id,parent_id or force_all (list all details)

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: List of categories that can be retrieved starting from certain item

get.description: Get count of customers from store.
Find customers in store.

parameters.name: find_where
parameters.description: Search customer by specific parameter, for example: e-mail,first_name,last_name.

get.description: Get details of customers from store.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: List of comma separated fields which need to be retrieved - for example: customers e-mail, first_name,last_name or force_all (list all details).

get.description: Get list of customers from store.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of customers in the list returned by request. Maximum value - 10. Default value - 10.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: List of comma separated fields which need to be retrieved - for example: customers e-mail, first_name,last_name or force_all (list all details).

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: List customer that can be retrieved starting from specific item

post.description: Update information of customer in store.

parameters.description: Number of orders in the list returned by request. Maximum value - 10. Default value - 10.

parameters.description: List of comma separated fields which need to be retrieved - for example: customers e-mail, first_name,last_name or force_all (list all details).

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: List order that can be retrieved starting from specific item

get.description: Info about order

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: List of comma separated fields which need to be retrieved - for example: customers e-mail, first_name,last_name or force_all (list all details).

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: List order that can be retrieved starting from specific item

get.description: Retrieve list of statuses
Count products in store.

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Get products count from specified category only. Default value “0” (count all products from all categories)

get.description: Retrieve all available fields for product item in store.
Search product in store catalog. "Apple" is specified here be default.

parameters.name: find_params
parameters.description: Find Product parameters. Default parameter: whole_words

parameters.name: find_where
parameters.description: Search product by parameter, for example: name,model,description

get.description: Get product info about product ID *** or specify other product ID.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: List of comma separated fields which need to be retrieved - example: name,model,description,id or force_all (list all details)

get.description: Get list of products from your store. Test method performance with 4 products.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of product in list returned by request. Maximum value 10. Default value 10.
